title: Corki Power
body:
Is it just me or does corki feel really weak in the early game since the change to ad carries. Or do you not build Tforce 1st anymore. Also does anyone else think Corki's Special delivery designed really badly, 5min cd, lasts 60 seconds from pick up at well, knocks enemies out of it, none of it seems to makes sense especially knocking enemies out of it kinda defeats the purpose.

anyway let me know what you guys think about it?

replies.body:
I can't tell why Tri Force would be bad on him :/ I think it'd still be quite good actually.

Maybe something like {{item:3078}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3139}} ?

Pretty sure T-force isn't the main item to build on him anymore (it's basically not worth building on most ADC's that did first item it, my assumption is corki will also face this.), and the package thing seems somewhat out of place, but it mostly works when your using it to save someone who is being chased (as they will likely walk back into the damage).

And corki is mostly a mid game magic dealing ADC, so not entirely sure he works in the current meta (aside from the fact that he can cover the magic damage loss of AD mid laners.)
yeah i feel like the Tri force was change for the sake of change and just doesn't bring any power now. So what would you suggest as a 1st item i was thinking Essence reaver to get the mana regen.
Honestly not entirely sure but ER > IE seems like it would be the best opening as it would allow you to spam your abilities and not run out of mana.
